result.eng: Would you like a cup of tea?
result.html: Ar mhaith leat cupán taeWould you like a cup of tea?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat cupán taeWould you like a cup of tea?

result.html: Ar mhaith leat tuilleadh taeWould you like more tea?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat tuilleaḋ taeWould you like more tea?

result.eng: Would you prefer a cup of tea?
result.html: Arbh fhearr leat cupán taeWould you prefer a cup of tea?
result.ponchtml: Arḃ ḟearr leat cupán taeWould you prefer a cup of tea?

result.eng: I would rather have coffee than tea.
result.html: B'fhearr liom caife ná taeI would rather have coffee than tea.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr liom caife ná taeI would rather have coffee than tea.

result.eng: I would like a cup of tea please.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom cupán tae le do thoil
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom cupán tae le do thoil
result.html: Ba mhaith liom cupán tae le do thoilI would like a cup of tea please.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom cupán tae le do ṫoilI would like a cup of tea please.

result.eng: Which would you prefer, tea or coffee?
result.ga: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caife
result.orig: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caife
result.html: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caifeWhich would you prefer, tea or coffee?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu ab ḟearr leat tae nó caifeWhich would you prefer, tea or coffee?

result.html: Is fearr liom tae láidirI prefer strong tea.
result.ponchtml: Is fearr liom tae láidirI prefer strong tea.

result.html: Tá an tae réidhThe tea is ready.
result.ponchtml: Tá an tae réiḋThe tea is ready.

result.ga: Tae le bainne le do thoil
result.orig: Tae le bainne le do thoil
result.html: Tae le bainne le do thoilTea with milk, please.
result.ponchtml: Tae le bainne le do ṫoilTea with milk, please.

result.html: Ar mhaith leat tuilleadh taeWould you like more tea?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat tuilleaḋ taeWould you like more tea?

result.eng: Will you have a cup of tea, Cathal?
result.ga: An mbeidh cupán tae agat a Chathail
result.orig: An mbeidh cupán tae agat a Chathail
result.html: An mbeidh cupán tae agat a ChathailWill you have a cup of tea, Cathal?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ cupán tae agat a ĊaṫailWill you have a cup of tea, Cathal?
